transforms.name: vite:vue
vite:css
transforms.result: .title-sign{border:1px solid #171a22;border-bottom:none;border-top:none;padding:1.5rem 1.5rem 10px;width:100%}.title-sign>div>ul{align-items:center;display:flex;justify-content:space-between}.title-sign>div>ul li{border-bottom:1px solid #d1d5db;padding:10px 0 15px;width:33.3%}.title-sign>div>ul li .next-title{align-items:center;display:flex;flex-direction:column;justify-content:flex-start}.title-sign>div>ul li .next-title .basic{align-items:center;background-color:#fff;border:1px solid #9da3ae;border-radius:50%;color:#212936;display:flex;font-weight:700;height:40px;justify-content:center;margin-bottom:10px;width:40px}.title-sign>div>ul li .next-title .text-title{color:#6c727f}.title-sign>div>ul li.active .basic,.title-sign>div>ul li.next .basic{border:none;color:#fff}.title-sign>div>ul li.active .text-title,.title-sign>div>ul li.next .text-title{color:#171a22;font-weight:700}.title-sign>div>ul li.active{border-bottom:3px solid #c9120d}.title-sign>div>ul li.active .next-title .basic{background:linear-gradient(140deg,#af0400,#e32924,#ffa5a3)}.title-sign>div>ul li.next{border-bottom:3px solid #6c727f}.title-sign>div>ul li.next .next-title .basic{background:linear-gradient(140deg,#171a22,#212936,#6c727f)}@media (min-width:769px){.title-sign>div>ul li.active .text-title,.title-sign>div>ul li.next .text-title{font-size:20px}}
